name: The Crime That Made Donuts Cry
name_original: The Crime That Made Donuts Cry
description: - Detective James Frederick gets a call from Abigail Hathaway who's the victim's wife, to find her husband, Aurther Froxi, who disappeared 2 days ago. Detective James gets on the case and agrees to help her find her husband. The next morning James wakes up to the news that the famous banker Aurther Froxi was found dead at a alley 2 streets before his office. Abigail Hathaway is found crying and sobbing and just devastated by this news. It's stated in the police report that Aurther Froxi shot himself dead. That he committed suicide. But her wife again comes to detective James's office to ask for his help to investigate Aurthers Death.
